attributes.action: Lower the age restriction of buying a razor
attributes.background: If you are old enough to grow hair you should be old enough to buy the equipment (razor) to remove it!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure at what age you'd like people to be able to buy a razor. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
